sentence: During the fiery hour-and-a-half event between Republican Josh Mandel and Democrat Morgan Harper, Mandel repeatedly attacked Ryan for failing to debate Harper so far and portrayed it as fundamental disrespect among state Democrats for their Black voter base.
author: Via AP news wire
title: Ryan, not onstage, takes central focus at Ohio Senate event

sentence: During the fiery hour-and-a-half event between Republican Josh Mandel and Democrat Morgan Harper, Mandel repeatedly attacked Ryan for failing to debate Harper so far and portrayed it as fundamental disrespect among state Democrats for their Black voter base.

title: Tim Ryan, not onstage, is early focus of Ohio Senate event

author: JULIE CARR SMYTH
title: Tim Ryan, not onstage, is early focus of Ohio Senate event

sentence: Sign Up This site is protected by recaptcha Privacy Policy | Terms of Service Josh Mandel, Ohio state treasurer, at a campaign stop for Sen. Marco Rubio, then a Republican presidential candidate, in Cleveland in 2015.Aaron Josefczyk / Reuters file ‘He seemed like a totally normal, regular Republican’ Ambition drove Mandel more than ideology early in his career, and establishment Republicans who saw in him a young and polite Jewish veteran who clicked with swing voters were eager to accommodate his quick rise.
title: Josh Mandel foreshadowed Trump’s rise. His Ohio Senate bid is a test of what’s next.

sentence: Sources tell The Daily Beast that Trump, a lover of gossip, has “privately regurgitated, often in disgust, a wide range of unverified, often completely unvetted, and lurid rumors about the MAGA candidate.” One source told the publication that Trump “has used the term ‘f*cking weird’ to describe Josh Mandel more than once,” and that he “has talked about [Mandel] and sex in the same sentence more times than I would have liked to hear.” (Reminder, by the way, that Trump has also been credibly accused of sexual misconduct by over two dozen women.)
author: Matt Prigge
title: A MAGA-fied Candidate Is Having Trouble Getting Trump’s Endorsement Due To Rumors Of His ‘F*cking Weird’ Sex Life

sentence: An Ohio Senate debate went off the rails as the crowd interrupted the Republican candidate, Josh Mandel, on race-based claims calling on him to leave the Black church where the event was being hosted.
title: Ohio Senate candidate hits back at 'radical leftists,' BLM members who shouted him down during debate

sentence: He trails Mike Gibbons by 11 points and Josh Mandel by 9 points.
author: Jason Easley
title: JD Vance Sided With Putin And Now He May Lose The Ohio Senate GOP Primary

sentence: Career politician Josh Mandel called investment banker Mike Gibbons a “p---y” under his breath at the end of the heated exchange.
author: Joseph Wilkinson
title: Republican Ohio Senate candidate calls opponent ‘p---y’ in near-altercation at debate

sentence: Scroll down for video +6 View gallery Senate hopefuls Mike Gibbons, 69, (left, standing) and Josh Mandel, 44, (right) came toe-to-toe at the primary debate after Mandel attacked the father-of-five's financial assets in China, claiming he 'made millions' there +6 View gallery Mandel appeared irritated toward Gibbons - who's wealth ranges anywhere from $83milllion to $286million - said he didn't 'think I made millions off of anything' Gibbons went on to say that former Marine 'didn't know squat' because he's never worked in private sector, to which Mandel replied that he had served two tours in Iraq and told the businessman: 'Don't tell me I haven't worked.'
title: Should've been boring but... Republican Ohio Senate hopefuls and millionaires Mike Gibbons and Josh Mandel nearly come to blows during primary debate about Chinese petroleum

sentence: Watch the original exchange below: Mike Gibbons and Josh Mandel get in each other\u2019s faces at tonight\u2019s GOP #OHSen forum hosted by FreedomWorks.\n\n\u201cYou watch what happens,\u201d Mandel says.pic.twitter.com/fQuqfHxXHT — Heartland Signal (@Heartland Signal) 1647644328
author: Matthew Chapman
title: Even Trump is 'baffled' as Ohio GOP candidates threaten each other over who deserves his endorsement: report

sentence: Fact-checkers have pushed back on the accusation that Ohio Senate candidate Josh Mandel photoshopped himself into an image included in one of his ads.
author: Gustaf Kilander
title: Photo filter blamed as Ohio Senate candidate accused of photoshop in ad
